title: Numbering Machine font
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150131042359im_/http:/typophile.com/files/RC_number_font_4182.jpg)

Can some please ID this face or something close?

Thank you!
author: SF

comments.content:
It was likely custom cut for that particular numbering machine.

While not visually the same, but in the same theme, Psy/Ops as a freebie just for numbering:

[http://www.psyops.com/html/download.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20150131042359/http:/www.psyops.com/html/download.html "http://www.psyops.com/html/download.html")

Nice! The closest I could find were [Monotype Modern](http://web.archive.org/web/20150131042359/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/monotype/monotype_modern_2/?sample_text=07509) and [Century Condensed](http://web.archive.org/web/20150131042359/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/creative_alliance/itc_century_condensed/?sample_text=07509) – but they’re not really a hit.

[Consort Condensed](http://web.archive.org/web/20150131042359/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/red_rooster/consort_condensed/?sample_text=07509&sample_size=96) also gets close to all but the '7'.

Also check out the [Numbers](http://web.archive.org/web/20150131042359/http:/typography.com/fonts/font_styles.php?productLineID=100018) series from H&FJ.

- Lex

Brilliant! Thank you.

You guys/gals are machines!  
again thank you.

sf
